an3.163-182:1.1: “Someone with three qualities is cast down to hell.
an3.163-182:1.3: They themselves kill living creatures. They encourage others to kill living creatures. And they approve of killing living creatures.
an3.163-182:1.4: Someone with these three qualities is cast down to hell.
an3.163-182:2.1: Someone with three qualities is raised up to heaven.
an3.163-182:2.3: They don’t themselves kill living creatures. They encourage others to not kill living creatures. And they approve of not killing living creatures. …
an3.163-182:3.1: They themselves steal. They encourage others to steal. And they approve of stealing. …
an3.163-182:4.1: They don’t themselves steal. They encourage others to not steal. And they approve of not stealing. …
an3.163-182:5.1: They themselves commit sexual misconduct. They encourage others to commit sexual misconduct. And they approve of committing sexual misconduct. …
an3.163-182:6.1: They don’t themselves commit sexual misconduct. They encourage others to not commit sexual misconduct. And they approve of not committing sexual misconduct. …
an3.163-182:7.1: They themselves lie. They encourage others to lie. And they approve of lying. …
an3.163-182:8.1: They don’t themselves lie. They encourage others to not lie. And they approve of not lying. …
an3.163-182:9.1: They themselves speak divisively. They encourage others to speak divisively. And they approve of speaking divisively. …
an3.163-182:10.1: They don’t themselves speak divisively. They encourage others to not speak divisively. And they approve of not speaking divisively. …
an3.163-182:11.1: They themselves speak harshly. They encourage others to speak harshly. And they approve of speaking harshly. …
an3.163-182:12.1: They don’t themselves speak harshly. They encourage others to not speak harshly. And they approve of not speaking harshly. …
an3.163-182:13.1: They themselves talk nonsense. They encourage others to talk nonsense. And they approve of talking nonsense. …
an3.163-182:14.1: They don’t themselves talk nonsense. They encourage others to not talk nonsense. And they approve of not talking nonsense. …
an3.163-182:15.1: They themselves are covetous. They encourage others to be covetous. And they approve of covetousness. …
an3.163-182:16.1: They themselves are content. They encourage others to be contented. And they approve of being contented. …
an3.163-182:17.1: They themselves have ill will. They encourage others to have ill will. And they approve of having ill will. …
an3.163-182:18.1: They themselves are kind-hearted. They encourage others to be kind-hearted. And they approve of kind-heartedness. …
an3.163-182:19.1: They themselves have wrong view. They encourage others to have wrong view. And they approve of wrong view. …
an3.163-182:20.1: They themselves have right view. They encourage others to have right view. And they approve of right view.
an3.163-182:20.2: Someone with these three qualities is raised up to heaven.”
